name: Therapeutic Complex Data File
summary: An XMLC file contains therapeutic complex data used by Biomedis M Air software, an app that manages the Biomedis M bioresonance correction device. It stores data in the XML standard configuring an electromagnetic oscillation session. Examples of data stored in an XMLC file include the therapy's name, duration, time frequency, and multi frequencies.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
